To beso140 : 

you are talking about uploading the picture with the torrent here at piratebay , right ? ok , so you click in the upload torrent as expected then you click in bayimg underlined and you choose a picture from your computer that can be for example jpg , png , gif etc. , can be close 140 different types of pictures that can be uploaded but i am refering some of the most common used types then you can resize the picture to a 300x300 on the bayimg because it is the most appropriate resolution to the pictures here at the piratebay and finally upload the picture , after you uploading the picture you will get a link and what you really want it is the last sequence of alphabet carachteres after the last obliquos trace "/" then you copy all the carachteres with your left mouse button and paste the copied carachteres to the empty space in front of the image tag from bayimg in the upload torrent page and after that you complete all the rest of the necessary information on the upload page , you set too the torrent file path and here we go clicking at the Add to index at the end of the uploading page and wait a few seconds until we see our new torrent file uploaded at piratebay with a nice 300x300 picture resolution ...
